title: Stop Waxing Poetic — Sarah Marzano (eMarketer) — Middlemen
description: Middlemen episode with Sarah Marzano (eMarketer) on in-store retail media: reality vs. hype and how to plan.
tldr: Guest: Sarah Marzano, Senior Analyst at eMarketer specializing in retail media
Focus: In-store retail media reality vs. hype and strategic planning
Key insight: Moving beyond buzzwords to practical implementation
learn: How to separate hype from reality in retail media
Strategic approaches to in-store retail media planning
Market insights from eMarketer's retail media research
takeaways: Reality check: In-store retail media requires practical, not poetic approaches
Market insights: Understanding actual consumer behavior vs. theoretical models

faq.a: Senior Analyst at eMarketer specializing in retail media trends and analysis
Cutting through the hype around in-store retail media to focus on practical implementation
Strategic planning and realistic expectations are essential for successful retail media programs
